revised_title: Raman Spectra of Sulphuric, Nitric, and Nitrosylsulphuric Acids
tldr: The authors investigated the Raman spectra of sulphuric, nitric, and nitrosylsulphuric acids to determine their molecular structures. They found that nitrosylsulphuric acid has unique spectral features, indicating the presence of specific groups within the molecule. The study also revealed similarities and differences in the spectra of the three acids, providing insights into their molecular configurations.
